content: --अग्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} fixed on one object or point only. {2} closely attentive, concentrated, intent; तद्गीतश्रवणैकाग्रा <ls>R. 15. 66</ls>; <ls>K. 49</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 72</ls>; मनुमेकाग्रमासीनं <ls>Ms. 1. 1.</ls> {3} unperplexed. {4} known, celebrated. {5} single-pointed. (--ग्रः (in <ab>Math.</ab>) the whole of the long side of a figure which is subdivided.
